name: switchable-cp
author: Tianze Ds Qiu (slaaker@126.com)
description: Create amount of daily plans, then quickly switch from one to another.

scripts.electron-mac: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy && cd electron && yarn run m && cd ../
scripts.electron-dev: vue-cli-service build --mode electron && npx cap copy && cd electron && yarn run e && cd ../
scripts.capacitor-android: vue-cli-service build --mode capacitor && npx cap copy && cd android && npx cap open android && cd ../
scripts.web: rm -r docs && vue-cli-service build --mode web && cp -r -f www/ docs
